word: the first day of second grade
There is no reason why kids should have to go to school.
meaning: 아이들이 학교에 가야 할 이유는 없다.

word: Kids can learn all we need to learn by watching TV.
meaning: 아이들은 TV를 보면서 우리가 배워야 할 모든 것을 배울 수 있다.

word: I won’t make them go to school.
meaning: 나는 그들을 학교에 가도록 강요하지 않을 것이다.

word: If they didn’t love school why did they become teachers?
meaning: 학교를 좋아하지 않았다면 왜 선생님이 되었을까?

word: I can eat a whole box of bonbons in on sitting.
meaning: 나는 한 자리에 앉아 보낸 한 상자를 통째로 먹을 수 있다.

word: Maybe going to school wouldn’t be so terrible after all.
meaning: 아마도 학교에 가는 것이 결국 그렇게 끔찍한 일은 아닐지도 모른다.

word: It was time to see how much we knew about arithmetic.
meaning: 우리가 산수에 대해 얼마나 알고 있는지 볼 시간이었다.

word: How many apples would you have left?
She counted the crayons from one to sixteen.
Miss Daisy still had a look on her face like she didn’t understand.
meaning: 데이지 선생님은 여전히 이해하지 못한 듯한 표정을 지었다.

word: No matter how many times we tried to explain
He had no hair at all!
Did all your hair fall out of your head?
That’s the saddest story I ever heard!
meaning: 그것은 내가 들은 가장 슬픈 이야기야!

word: You can pay people to read for you.
meaning: 다른 사람에게 돈을 주고 읽게 할 수 있어요.

word: It wouldn’t matter whether or not I could spell.
meaning: 내가 철자를 쓸 수 있든 없든 상관없을 거야.

word: The whole chalkboard was filled with words.
I’m really glad I decided to become a teacher.
meaning: 저는 선생님이 되기로 결심한 것이 정말 기쁩니다.

word: I traded it with Mike for his potato chips.
She’s the weirdest teacher I ever had.
meaning: 그녀는 내가 가진 선생님 중 가장 이상한 선생님이야.

word: My head was starting to fill with all kinds of awful things Miss Daisy could be.
meaning: 내 머리는 데이지 선생님이 될 수 있는 온갖 끔찍한 것들로 채워지기 시작했다.

word: She doesn’t look like a kidnapper to me.
Ryan came up with the most genius idea in the history of the world.
meaning: 라이언은 세계 역사상 가장 천재적인 아이디어를 생각해냈다.

word: Could we turn it into a video-game arcade?
It didn’t make sense at all.
I will have to keep an eye on her.
The heavier you are; the smarter you are.
Everybody laughed even though I didn’t say anything funny.
meaning: 내가 재미있는 말을 한 게 아닌데 모두 웃었다.

word: Emily got all upset and ran out of the room crying.
meaning: 에밀리는 완전히 화가 나서 울며 방을 뛰쳐나갔다.

word: She gave Miss Daisy a big smile.
meaning: 그녀는 데이지 선생님에게 큰 미소를 지어 보였다.
